    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forward(OutputStream out)
      Write all frames of this message to given stream.
      WebSocketMessage.Direction getDirection()
      Returns either WebSocketMessage.Direction.INCOMING if this message originated from server side, or WebSocketMessage.Direction.OUTGOING if it came from the browser.
      WebSocketMessageDTO getDTO()
      Returns another presentation on this message object, used to decouple the user interface from this version specific implementation.
      byte[] getPayload()
      Returns the 'original' payload as found in the WebSocket frame.

      Add next frame to this message.

      Modifies the payload to given byte array.

      • getPayload

        public byte[] getPayload()
        Description copied from class: WebSocketMessage
        Returns the 'original' payload as found in the WebSocket frame. Returned bytes array does not back the messages payload buffer (i.e. it is a copy).
        Specified by:
        getPayload in class WebSocketMessage
        Returns:
        bytes of payload
